attributes.action: Job centre plus and recruitment agencies must work together.
attributes.additional_details: It would be better if the DWP and recruitment agencies worked together and created an agreement that would ensure that Jobseekers could work for temporary periods and not sign off but be eligible for payment after their work assignment finishes. This would help Jobseekers that genuinely want to work, it would also give them relevant work experience and relieve the benefit system.
